metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3820 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The ih264d decoder in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-08-01mishandles slice numbers, which allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 28673410.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
